Is Astroblast still reaching for Firearm after being hit?

::Firearm/Kluster::

All the shots on Firearm are successful, the robot remaining laying on 
the shields in stasis lock and roasting slowly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster rolls out of the way of Astroblast's shots, firing back with a 
missile. He hoped that the Decepticons would get away from Firearm so 
that he could drop him through the shields.
